author: ihechikara
message:
feat(curriculum): add fruit search useEffect workshop (#59544)

Co-authored-by: moT01 <20648924+moT01@users.noreply.github.com>

files.patch: @@ -3571,7 +3571,12 @@ "In these lecture videos, you will learn about effects and referencing values with React." ] }, - "xdyh": { "title": "270", "intro": [] }, + "workshop-fruit-search-app": { + "title": "Build a Fruit Search App", + "intro": [ + "In this workshop, you will continute to learn about the useEffect() hook by building an application that fetches fruit data from an API based on user input and displays the results dynamically." + ] + }, "vjgg": { "title": "272", "intro": [] }, "review-react-state-and-hooks": { "title": "React State and Hooks Review",

@@ -0,0 +1,9 @@ +--- +title: Introduction to the Introduction to the Fruit Search App +block: workshop-fruit-search-app +superBlock: full-stack-developer +--- + +## Introduction to the Introduction to the Fruit Search App + +In this workshop, you will continute to learn about the useEffect() hook by building an application that fetches fruit data from an API based on user input and displays the results dynamically.
